  • Method Details

    • createArea

      protected abstract void createArea()
      Create the area by adding it all actors. Called by begin(Window, FileSystem).

      Note: call Area.setBehavior(AreaBehavior) as needed too!

    • getFactionCenter

      public abstract DiscreteCoordinates getFactionCenter (ICWarsActor.Faction faction)
      Get the center coordinate of the ICWarsArea for the input faction.

      This is used as the spawn coordinates for the player.

      Parameters:
      faction - The Faction that the center point is returned for.

    • factionUnits

      public abstract List<Unit> factionUnits (ICWarsActor.Faction faction)
      Get a Faction's Units for this Area.
      Parameters:
      faction - The Faction for which the Units should be returned.
      Returns:
      The list of Units

    • getCameraScaleFactor

      public final float getCameraScaleFactor()
      Returns the default scale factor of the camera when viewing this area
      Specified by:
      getCameraScaleFactor in class Area
      Returns:
      10.f

    • begin

      public boolean begin (Window window, FileSystem fileSystem)
      Start the area's simulation by:
      • call Area.begin(Window, FileSystem) and if successful continue;
      • call Area.setBehavior(AreaBehavior) with a new ICWarsBehavior;
      • call createArea().
      Specified by:
      begin in interface Playable
      Overrides:
      begin in class Area
      Parameters:
      window - The Window that the game is displayed in.
      fileSystem - The FileSystem that the game gets its visual resources from.
      Returns:
      true if the game successfully started.
